greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generalized Catalan array FS(4; n,r).
comment: In the Frey-Sellers reference this array is called {n over r}_{m-1}, with m=4.
The step width sequence of this staircase array is [1,3,3,3,....], i.e. the degree of the row polynomials is [0,3,6,9,...]= A008585.
The columns r=0..6 give A000012 (powers of 1), A000027 (natural), A000217 (triangular), A000292 (tetrahedral), A063258, A027659, A062966.
link: D. D. Frey and J. A. Sellers, Generalizing Bailey's generalization of the Catalan numbers, The Fibonacci Quarterly, 39 (2001) 142-148.
formula: G.f. for column r=3*k+j, k >= 0, j=1, 2, 3: (x^(k+1))*N(4; k, x)/(1-x)^(3*k+1+j), with the row polynomials N(4; k, x) of array A062751.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 12 2001
